name: Caseflood.ai
headline: AI admin/operations staff for law firms
description: Caseflood.ai helps law firms cut costs by a third and increase average case value by 20% by replacing their entire admin/operations staff with AI agents. It takes care of all admin tasks - from client intake to case analysis to engaging clients - allowing for firms to be run more profitably and wildly more efficient. Caseflood.ai is on a mission to fundamentally change the unit economics of the legal industry.

founders.name: Ethan Hilton, Founder
founders.description: 18 | AI Agents to replace non-lawyer employees in law firms | Ex-CMU AI

founders.name: Ayushman Srivastava, Founder
founders.description: Building Caseflood.ai | MS in AI in Information Systems at CMU | Previously : Fraud Detection @ Swiggy (India) and Chief Data Scientist @ Mu Sigma.

raw_markdown="[Skip to content](https://caseflood.ai/<#content>)

[ ![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Caseflood_WhiteOrange.png?fit=868%2C217&ssl=1) ](https://caseflood.ai/<https:/caseflood.ai>)

  * [Pricing](https://caseflood.ai/<https:/caseflood.ai/pricing>)


[Book Demo](https://caseflood.ai/<https:/cal.com/ethanhilton/>)
[ ![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Heading-6.png?fit=800%2C175&ssl=1) ](https://caseflood.ai/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/caseflood-ai>)
#  Automate client communications - seriously.
## The all-in-one system that intakes, closes, updates, and manages clients. We set it up for you, and then it's on autopilot.
## 24/7
Call answering
## Unlimited
Hours of calls
## $650
Monthly starting price
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Caseflood_Home_NewClients.png?fit=800%2C917&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Caseflood_Home_Graph.png?fit=467%2C150&ssl=1)
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/John-Caseflood-1.png?fit=2160%2C2160&ssl=1)
## 24/7
Call answering
## Unlimited
Hours of calls
## $650
Monthly starting price
## .
##  Meet your  new AI employees
##  Luna
## Intake Specialist
## New client intake
When a new client calls in, you **want** Luna to pick it up for you. She gathers deep, rich information about the client’s matter while making the caller feel special and heard.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Book consultations
If a new client is qualified, she urges them to book a consultation. On average, she converts 94% of qualified callers to book a **paid** consultation.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/3.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
## Forwards callers
She forwards callers to the appropriate attorney when needed and knows how to specifically handle new clients, existing clients, opposing counsel, and judges.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-3.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Multilingual
She’s just as good in **20+ languages.** Unlock new channels for clients and save on translators.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-10.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
##  Bob
## Case Analyst
## New matter email
Once Luna passes off the information that she gathered on the phone, Bob sends you an **executive summary email** with contact info, priority level, case summary, and more.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-5.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
## Case prioritization
You’re busy, and have more people than you can help seeking your services. When callers call in with new matters, you want to **know who to respond to first**. Bob tells you who and why.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-4.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Client Information
He sends you a short and simple synopsis of the caller’s information, clarifying for you which pieces of info he’s sure about and which ones are left unconfirmed by the caller.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-6.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Case summary
Bob compiles the most relevant details from Luna’s call so that you can decide what to do about the incoming matter.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-7.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
##  Jess
## Client Manager
## Closes clients
Jess **is a closing powerhouse.** She uses one simple trick to make that happen: consistent, personalized follow-up. She weaves in the lead’s fears and goals with success stories and key differentiators about your firm.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-13.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
## Scheduled reminders
Jess makes sure that **clients show up**. She reminds clients of upcoming meetings and tasks that they need to act on, and clients can ask her questions and reschedule times.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-9.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Keeps clients engaged
Jess **keeps clients engaged.** She delivers the type of client care and customer service that you’ve always wanted your staff to do.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-8.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
## Schedules meetings
When clients ask Luna to schedule a meeting, Jess finds an empty time in your calendar and then checks with you, so you can decide how you want to spend your time.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-11.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
##  Coming soon
## Case Manager
![3](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/3-1.png?fit=1920%2C1080&ssl=1)
![2](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/2.png?fit=1920%2C1080&ssl=1)

![3](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/3-1.png?fit=1920%2C1080&ssl=1)
## We don't like to talk about ourselves
### But we don’t mind if our customers do.
![Patrick Monahan](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/patmon.jpg?fit=348%2C348&ssl=1)
Patrick Monahan
 _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_
Managing Partner, Desert Valley Law
We haven’t had a dependable intake person for over a year and a half, almost 2 years. You are fantastic beyond words. Your team is phenomenal and very responsive, which has been a blessing to work with. Thank you! 
![Drew Willey](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Screenshot-2025-02-11-at-10.54.52%E2%80%AFPM.png?fit=678%2C650&ssl=1)
Drew Willey
 _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_
Managing Partner, Mane Injury Lawyer
Caseflood’s AI solution was a breath of fresh air and a needed solution to allow me to actually grow my practice in a financially viable way. Without it, I’d either be forced to a super risky place of investing a lot up front or just knowing that I’d miss out on the 80% of people who hang up before leaving a voicemail. All the features and turn-key automations with Caseflood are great, but honestly, the demo speaks for itself. 
![Bill Beck](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/02/Beck_William_456-LibertyLaw-097-Retouched-2.webp?fit=500%2C500&ssl=1)
Bill Beck
 _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_ _☆_
Managing Partner, Liberty Law Center
I'm honored that your team spent a day with us at our firm. We mentioned ideas and you made them a reality within days - I've never had a vendor like that. You're increasing our conversion rates and managing client interactions for us - it just feels like my practice is easier now. 
## And we integrate into all your favorite software:
##  The Caseflood.ai Process
## Onboarding Call
First, meet the award-winning engineering team that will custom-make your firm’s intake system. In 30 minutes, they’ll work with you to pinpoint exactly what you want.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Call-Flow-Builder.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## Be Included in the Process
Once your team of engineers begins working, you’ll receive personal updates on the status of your system.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/4.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
## Hands-free integration
After learning about your firm, we’ll make sure that our system fits neatly and unobtrusively into the software stack you’re already comfortable with. The process typically takes 3-5 days.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/https___4d04b4137fe2d7f3d0ffb5a70c4ef77e.cdn_.bubble.io_f1718650380819x641911233226300400_Phone20Routing20Graphic.png?fit=800%2C450&ssl=1)
## You're in!
And just like that, your law firm is leaner, taking on higher-quality cases, and satisfying clients; all while you have more hours in the day to focus on what really matters. You’re using Caseflood.ai.
![](https://i0.wp.com/caseflood.ai/wp-content/uploads/2025/01/Meet-your-new-AI-employees-12.png?fit=768%2C432&ssl=1)
##  The Caseflood.ai difference
## No admin staff
**Not helpful**
  * Miss more calls
  * Client frustration
  * Inbox overload
  * Limited accessibility
  * Opportunity costs
  * Zero improvement
  * Feedback famine
  * Admin pileup


## Caseflood.ai
**Oh yeah.**
  * 2.1x average conversion rate increase
  * Cost savings
  * Zero training time
  * Working 24/7
  * 100% consistent
  * No more updating clients
  * More 5-star reviews


## Hire (more) staff
**Way too expensive**
  * Salary costs
  * Training time
  * Vacation time and holidays
  * Consistency? What's that?
  * Benefits bundle
  * Scheduling snares
  * Desk space dilemma
  * Performance variability

generated_description:
**Caseflood.ai** is a bold new entry in the legal tech sector, founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator’s Batch W25. Based in San Francisco, this innovative startup is on a mission to revolutionize the way law firms operate by deploying AI to take over administrative and operational roles that typically consume valuable time and resources.

### What Do They Do?
At its core, Caseflood.ai helps law firms cut operational costs by up to a third while increasing the average value of cases by about 20%. How? By replacing traditional admin staff with AI agents that handle everything from client intake to case analysis and engagement, allowing firms to run more profitably and efficiently.

The platform boasts an all-in-one AI system that operates around the clock, performing tasks with remarkable consistency and speed. This includes features like 24/7 call answering, multilingual support, and a user-friendly interface tailored to integrate seamlessly into existing software systems. Their monthly subscriptions start at a competitive $650.

### Meet the AI Team
The “employees” of Caseflood.ai—think of them as virtual members of your firm—include:

- **Luna**: The Intake Specialist who engages with potential clients and schedules consultations, achieving a staggering 94% conversion rate from calls to booked consultations.

- **Bob**: The Case Analyst who follows up on initial client calls with concise executive summaries, prioritizing cases based on urgency and providing essential details for the attorneys.

- **Jess**: The Client Manager who ensures ongoing communication with clients, scheduling meetings, sending reminders, and maintaining engagement, ensuring that no one feels neglected in the process.

### The Business Model
Caseflood.ai aims to disrupt the traditional unit economics of the legal industry by offering law firms the chance to manage their client relationships and internal operations without the overhead costs of hiring numerous staff members. They outline the drawbacks of maintaining a human admin staff—missed calls, inconsistent service, and escalating salary costs—making a compelling case for their AI-driven solution.

### Backing and Team
With a small but mighty team of three, including Group Partner Jared Friedman from Y Combinator, Caseflood.ai recently raised $500k to further its goals. They’re not just tech enthusiasts; they understand the intricacies of the legal field and are passionate about using AI to enhance it.

### Client Feedback
Early adopters of Caseflood.ai have been vocal about its impact. Legal professionals have praised the decrease in missed calls and the increase in client engagement, emphasizing that the AI services allow them to focus on what truly matters: practicing law.

### Conclusion
In a landscape where traditional law firms often struggle with efficiency and cost, Caseflood.ai presents a refreshing alternative. By embracing AI as a core component of their operations, they’re poised to redefine the future of legal service delivery. If you’re curious about what they can do for your practice, their website offers demos and detailed insights into their offerings: [Caseflood.ai](https://caseflood.ai).
